title: Why Leaders Lie: The Truth About Lying In International Politics
description: For more than two decades, John J. Mearsheimer has been regarded as one of the foremost realist thinkers on foreign policy. Clear and incisive as well as a fearlessly honest analyst, his coauthored 2007 New York Times bestseller, The Israel Lobby and U.S. Foreign Policy, aroused a firestorm with its unflinching look at the making of AmericaÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s Middle East policy. Now he takes a look at another controversial but understudied aspect of international relations: lying.
